about_the_game:
Dress your heroines for success with the Heroine Character Generator 10 for MZ pack! Gee-kun-soft is back with another set of MZ-style generator parts to give your party members and NPCs recognizable appearances, offering up military-inspired uniforms, quirky cloth armor, and fantasy outfits that you can top with accessories and shining eyes. This pack’s 60 pieces include 5 AccA, 8AccB, 20 Clothing, 2 Wings, 2 Ears, 2 Eyebrows, 5 Eyes, 2 Faces, 2 Mouths, 2 Noses, 5 Front Hair, and 5 Rear Hair are ready to give your characters striking new looks.

Designed to work easily with this pack’s shaded faces, each part can be mixed and matched to perfectly fit your game’s world! Give a party member pointy elf ears and sparkling eyes while she’s dressed in a crisp white uniform to add some fun fantasy to your sci-fi game, or reveal a secret about your medieval-inspired world with some hi-tech space suits and helmets that your heroines can wear into battle after exploring an ancient temple. Let a sorceress have a cute cat-like familiar float next to her who can offer new spells for a price, and have your favorite female party member start wearing an adorable feather or stylized skull hairpin after the main character takes her on a date.

This pack also includes body bases that work well with the lightweight outfits as well as gradients with some additional colors so you can make your heroines stand out with unique outfit and eye colors. Pick up Heroine Character Generator 10 for MZ and prepare your heroines for dangerous space battles, strategic military operations, and parties where flamboyant outfits are required!


This pack includes:

* Clothes: 20
* Eyes: 5
* Accessories
* Front Hair: 5
* Rear Hair: 5

※Please read before purchasing※

This generator material comes with an optimized base body, so please save the default base body in a separate local folder, etc., and then store the optimized base body in each generator folder.


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

short_description: Gee-kun-soft’s latest generator pack offers up 47 female parts to help your party members and important NPCs stand out from background characters
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
